SourceProxy.name: vtkPVoronoiReader
SourceProxy.label: vtkPVoronoiReader
SourceProxy.Documentation: Reads voronoi tesselations generated by the TESS code.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the PNG reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: HeaderSize
IntVectorProperty.label: HeaderSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: HeaderSize use in the Voronoi files. Current versions of DIY have a header size of 256 (default). Some older versions however used a header size of 7. This property allows one to control the header size accordingly.
